name: Inn of the Governors

reviews.title: A Wonderful Place
reviews.text: My new husband and I stayed at Inn of the Governors last week for our honeymoon. I made the reservation on hotels.com, but then called the hotel to upgrade to a nicer room for our honeymoon. The woman I spoke with was very accommodating. When we arrived, our room had a gift bag containing a bottle of wine and two wine glasses, with a card wishing us a happy honeymoon.

reviews.title: Inn not as shown in pictures- disappointed
reviews.text: The room was cozy and comfortable, with beautiful southwestern decor. We also had a Kiva fireplace in the room, which we used each night. Each day, the housekeeping staff would clean out the fireplace from the previous night, and place new wood in the fireplace.
The inn has a free breakfast buffet, much nicer than most. They also have a very nice restaurant called Del Charro, with the best Margaritas I have ever tasted.
reviews.title: Loved this hotel!

description: Inn of the Governors is a leader in hospitality among Santa Fe Hotels. We provide world-class service, a beautiful downtown location, complimentary Mountain Sunrise full breakfast, free parking and complimentary Tea and Sherry served daily in our lobby.
